Package pointsandrectangleslab

Class APRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pointsandrectangleslab.APRectangle
  • public class APRectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Rectangle object that stores the information of the rectangle and methods for the rectangle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double myAngle
      Stores the angle of rotation of the rectangle
      private double myHeight
      Stores the height value of the rectangle
      private APPoint myTopLeft
      Stores the information of top left point of the rectangle
      private double myWidth
      Stores the width value the rectangle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

      Constructor of APRectangle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws a rectangle in JFrame
      double getAngle()
      Return the angle of rotation
      APPoint getBottomLeft()
      Calculate and return the bottom left Point of the rectangle Calculates the bottom left point from top left point using sin, cos, and height
      APPoint getBottomRight()
      Calculate and return the bottom right Point of the rectangle Calculates the bottom right point from top right point using sin, cos, height

      Return the height of the rectangle

      Return the top left point of the rectangle

      Return the width of the rectangle

      Composes and returns a String that includes the top left point, width, and height of the rectangle

      • APRectangle

        public APRectangle​(APPoint topLeft,
                   double width,
                   double height)
        Constructor of APRectangle
        Parameters:
        topLeft - an APPoint object that includes the point of top left corner of new APRectangle object
        width - a double value of width of the new APRectangle object
        height - a double value of height of the new APRectangle object

      • getTopRight

        public APPoint getTopRight()
        Calculate and return the top right Point of the rectangle Calculates the top right point from top left point using sin, cos, and width
        Returns:
        new APPoint object that stores top right point of the rectangle

      • getBottomLeft

        public APPoint getBottomLeft()
        Calculate and return the bottom left Point of the rectangle Calculates the bottom left point from top left point using sin, cos, and height
        Returns:
        new APPoint object that stores bottom left point of the rectangle

      • getBottomRight

        public APPoint getBottomRight()
        Calculate and return the bottom right Point of the rectangle Calculates the bottom right point from top right point using sin, cos, height
        Returns:
        new APPoint object that stores bottom right point of the rectangle

      • shrink

        public void shrink​(double percent)
        Shrink the height and width of the rectangle to the corresponding percentage
        Parameters:
        percent - double value for percentage, 0.0 ~ 100.0

      • printAPRectangle

        public static java.lang.String printAPRectangle​(APRectangle r)
        Composes and returns a String that includes the top left point, width, and height of the rectangle
        Parameters:
        r - an APRectangle object
        Returns:
        a String in a form of "[APRectangle ({x},{y}) {width}, {height}]"
